title: Adelina's
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Pizza, Italian, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Menu is 80% vegetarian at this Roman Fraschetta (Roman working class wine bar, pizzeria, and restaurant) in Greenpoint Brooklyn. Features 10 wines on tap (with certified vegan wine options), and marks the vegan (VGN) and many vegetarian (VGT) choices. Kitchen uses mostly local organic and local ingredients and make everything from scratch, with organic flours for the pizza dough, natural mozzarella, san marzano tomato for pizza. Offers nutritional yeast as a substitution for vegans when requested. Owned and operated by a long-time vegetarian.
